results.title: Metformin Actions on the Liver: Protection Mechanisms Emerging in Hepatocytes and Immune Cells against NASH-Related HCC
results.text_hl: With respect to directly evaluating @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as a treatment option for @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_Hepatocellular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006528 @@@HCC@@@, several ongoing clinical trials combine @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ with PD-1 antibodies or others for treating @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_Hepatocellular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006528 @@@HCC@@@.

results.title: Metformin reduces hepatocarcinogenesis by inducing downregulation of Cyp26a1 and CD8+ T cells
results.text_hl: However, despite decades of research, the mechanism underlying the @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_Hepatocellular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006528 @@@HCC@@@-inhibiting effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ remains a topic of debate.
